name: DisableIISApplication
description: Utilizes the app_offline.htm file in ASP.NET to take a website or webapplication offline.
author: pwshliquori

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source file path to the app_offline.htm file. The file path must include the app_offline.htm file. e.g. C:/Temp/app_offline.htm

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target destination path: UNC path or remote computer local path.

inputs.name: uncPath
inputs.label: UNC Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: UNC path destination path to copy the app_offline.htm file.

inputs.name: computerName
inputs.label: Computer Names:
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of remote computers to copy the app_offline.htm file to.

inputs.name: localPath
inputs.label: Local Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local folder to copy the app_offline.htm file.
